## Installation

[Install all __fgeo__ packages in one step](https://forestgeo.github.io/fgeo/index.html#installation)

```
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("forestgeo/fgeo.map")
```

For details on how to install packages from GitHub, see [this article](https://goo.gl/dQKEeg).

## Example

```{r fgeo.map-sp}
library(fgeo.map)

census <- fgeo.data::luquillo_tree6_random
some_sp <- subset(census, sp %in% c("PREMON", "CASARB"))
map_sp_elev(some_sp)
```

[Get started with __fgeo__](https://forestgeo.github.io/fgeo/articles/fgeo.html)
